Released Versions

V1.x.x - June 24th 2018 (Deprecated)
  • works with Expressjs >= 4.x.x version
  • works with Typescript >= 2.4.x version
  • works with Nodejs >= 8.10.x version
V2.x.x - August 10th 2018

There are no breaking changes from V1.x.x to V2.x.x. You can easily upgrade.

  • works with Expressjs >= 4.x.x version
  • works with Typescript >= 2.4.x version
  • works with Nodejs >= 8.10.x version
Why V2.x.x is released in less time?

We have added lot of new API methods (without breaking V1.x API) and features to make developer lives easier. To have a proper tracking, we have preferred V2.x.x
